name: Magic&Clock
description:
A short platformer game, where you must complete in a limited time, with magic to help in your way.

Credits: 

Main character: https://o-lobster.itch.io/platformmetroidvania-pixel-art-asset-pack

Grass tileset: https://trixelized.itch.io/nightfield

Magic effect: https://untiedgames.itch.io/five-free-pixel-explosions

Magic clock: https://pipoya.itch.io/pipoya-free-vfx-time-magic
